title: Railworks TS2015 - Colton and Northern
description:
Welcome aboard the Colton & Northern, a brand new North American route for RailWorks.  

Colton & Northern is a rail line that has grown over the decades 
and runs between the cities of Westin and Colton. 
The route features over 30 industries to be serviced, over a hundred spurs, 
numerous detailed towns, signals and over 20 imaginative scenarios.

Highly detailed buildings, realistic sounds, AI train operations 
and authentic terrain mapping and track placement complete the package, 
which also features bonus content of the 3dTrains low-resolution

as well as plenty of switching action - if you don't mind getting your hands dirty, 
your feet wet, and your overalls greasy handling the big engines and rolling stock, 
then the Colton & Northern is looking for people like you!
